title: No Residue, No Scent, No Issues
body: I have sensitive skin to the point where I used Clinique for 20+yrs in fear of how other products reacted on my skin from redness to residue. Finally, I started branching out and I'm forever glad of it. This is fantastic. There is no residue after application. No lotiony weight, no oily slick, no gunky feel. It just absorbs nicely without reaction. Plus, very little to no scent. In the time since I've purchased, I've used it daily and noticed healthier, brighter somewhat tighter skin on my face. Overall, would recommend and purchase again

title: Quite pricey for what it doesn't do...

I saw this being advertised as "clearing and dark spots on the face", so I gave it a try. It doesn't exactly do that: it doesn't get rid of any sun spots, dark spots, whatever spots you have on your face. It does provide some moisturizing effect, but it leaves your face feeling sticky.

I think this product works best if you already are blemish-free and have clear to glass skin.

Y‚Äôall, I did not know I had to really invest in my making my skin barrier as healthy as possible to stop my constant break outs. The serum (and essence water) leave my skin really hydrated, plump, and so soft. I can‚Äôt stop touching my cheeks (which is bad, I know). I love them, I would absolutely recommend the serum AND the essence water.

title: Really impressed
body: I have been using this serum for a month now and am really impressed. I decided to try this serum as I am post-menopausal and gingseng has estrogen-like compounds in it. I thought a ginseng serum might help with fine lines and texture. This serum is fragrance free. I thought it would smell like gingseng but no. The serum is the consistency of a thin gel. I press two drops into my skin. It absorbs quickly. As for results, I have been really impressed by how this serum evens out skin tone with use. Any pigmentation I had from sun exposure is really improved. In addition, the serum is very skin softening. I highly recommend this product for mature skin.
